Tips ‘n’ Tricks¶

These are some tips that could be useful

To make a square edge, go forward by the width, then back by the same amount.

A cross section is only laid down when forward or backward are invoked. This means, for example, that repeated calls to set_pos will not show up. To get them to show up then insert:

fd(0)
